1.content:
Ash and Dawn were walking through route 202 towards Sandgem Town. The two of them had decided to venture back to Kanto together, and crash at Ash's house for a while. They both agreed happily to the idea. Brock had already left for Kanto - there was urgent business for him to attend to at the Pewter City Gym, so he left on a ferry from Sunyshore City. Ash and Dawn had decided that before they went to Kanto, they would go see Dawn's mom and Professor Rowan and say their goodbyes.

However, along the way, Dawn caught a shiny object in the corner of her eye. "Ash, what's that?" She said, pointing to it. She ran into the bushes to pick it up, and emerged with a glowing yellow stone. "It's so pretty!" She exclaimed. "I wonder how much it would be worth?"

"As much as it is pretty," Ash replied, "I don't like the look of it."

"You don't like it?"

"No, it's not that, it just seems... odd..."

Ash walks over to Dawn and places his hand on the rock. Much to their surprise, the stone emits beams of light from all sides. "What's going on?" Dawn asks amidst all the light.

Then, something strange happens...
1.title: the intro

11.content:
As the light enveloped Ash and Dawn, they felt themselves begin to fuse into eachother. No matter how hard they tried, they were unable to pull themselves away from eachother and kept on melding into one body. After a few seconds, the light from the stone faded and fell to the ground.

Ash and Dawn were officially creeped out. They looked down, through the one face, and screamed in horror. The body not only had a set of D-cup breasts, but a penis aswell. The hips were that of a man's, as were the legs, covered in menacing hair, but the shoulders were unbroadened and the arms were skinny and lanky. The face of this body shared traits from both Ash and Dawn; it had Dawn's mouth, but Ash's nose and eyes. Dawn's hair was on top, however it was now fully black like Ash's, and although she still had her hat and hair accessories, they were all the colour of Ash's cap. They also wore Dawn's scarf, shirt and skirt, however for some reason they also wore Ash's jeans and shoes. To the normal passer-by, they would have looked more like a girl than anything - albeit a poorly dressed one at that - but inside, and under the underpants, they were of two genders.

"Oh my God," They spoke, realising both their voices were present and saying the same thing. "What happened to us?" They stopped and thought, clearly in shock. "We can't go out like this! We'll look like freaks! we need to undress, and get some of this stuff." But it was to no avail, as the clothes were magically stuck on them, and they were unable to take anything off.

"Oh, God, we can't be stuck like this forever!" They cried.
11.title: Dawn and Ash fuse together

111.content:
Alright, alright. We just gotta calm down." Ash and Dawn, occupying the smae twisted body, were freaking out. "First thing's first. We gotta get help. If we go see Professor Rowan, he might know what to do. But if anyone asks us for our name, we'll say..." That caused them to ponder for a minute. "Dash. Dawn plus Ash equals dash! Brilliant! Now, let's go!"

Dawn and Ash - or should I say Dash - ran towards the lab in Sandgem Town.
111.title: They try to obtain help

choices: Half of the rock fuses with Ash and Dawn's left hand.
1111.content:
Dash reaches Sandgem town without incident, hiding from anyone who may cross their path and carefully sneaked into Professor Rowan's office, through a window. He was not there.

"What are we going to do?" asked Dawn and Ash, tears forming in their eyes.

"We need to relax and wait." they replied. "If we go looking for the professor, we will be spotted for sure."

Just then, Professor Rowan entered his office and let out a loud gasp upon seeing the fused form of Ash and Dawn."

"My God!" he yelled. "Ash! Dawn! What happened to you two!?!"

"You know its us?" asked Dash in his/her combined voice.

Professor Rowan nodded. "I can tell by the way you two smell."

Dash took a step back. "The way we what?"

"Dawn uses only one type of perfume and Ash only uses one type of deodorant. But never mind that. What happened to you two!?!"

Dash showed professor Rowen the rock and explained what had happened. When he/she finished, Rowen nodded in understanding. "You two found a Tgos (Tea-goss)"

"A Tgos?"

"Trans-Gender Ora Stone." replied Rowen. "It transforms anyone who touches it into almost anything, depending upon what they are thinking at the time. Also, the longer you hold the rock, the greater the chances of you changing again."

"But how do we separate?" asked Ash and Dawn, in their combined voice.

Rowen shrugged. "What were you two thinking when you touched the rock?"

"I wished Ash could see my reasoning." he/she replied then said, "I wished Dawn could see my reasoning."

"Well, then, try to understand the other's logic and you should separate."

Dash closed his eyes, trying his best to to as Professor rowen suggested. Then, a blinding light filled the office. When the light faded, they found that they had separated but something else had happened.

What happened?

111122.content:
"Oh!" said Ash, gripping his stomach. "I don't feel so good!"

Then, Dawn gasped, seeing cat like ears growing from his head.

"Ash!" she shouted. "You're changing!"

Ash turned to a mirror on the wall and gasped himself, seeing his hair turn a light brown as his entire body quickly shrank, his clothing falling off of him as it did.

"What's happening to me, professor!?!" asked Ash, panicking. "I can... Neko!"

Ash threw a hand over his mouth, surprised then looked at it to find claw like nails growing from it, much like a cat's paw!

"Professor Rowe... Neko!"

The changes came faster as Ash's body shrank until he was no taller than his Pickachew. A cat like tail grew from his back and his face softened, becoming almost girl like as his eyes turned yellow. Finally, a small pair of black wings grew from his upper back and flapped lightly as if to stretch themselves out.

Within seconds, Ash looked more like a cat with no body hair than a person.

http://www.mangabullet.com/galleryimg/20...

Dawn gasped, shocked by this transformation, then gave a loving smile.

"Aw! You're so cute!" she said. She teasingly pulled out a Poke ball. "I wonder if I can catch you?"

Ash waved his now tiny little arms. "Neko! Neko!" he said, trying to communicate. He turned to Professor rowen for help but took a step back as he noticed a strange look on his face.

"Is... Is he drooling?" thought Ash.

He looked again, Rowen was! He was looking at Ash as if he were the greatest treasure on earth.

"Ooooohhhhhh!" he said, wiping his mouth clean with his sleeve. "A new and undiscovered Pokemon!" He shook his head and cleared his throat. "Ahem! I'm sorry this happened to you, Ash. But this transformation opens a great opportunity for you."

"Neko?" asked Ash.

"Where is he going with this?" he wondered.

"Yes." replied Rowen. "You see, I study Pokemon for a living. And with you now a undiscovered Pokemon, it is my duty to run a number of tests to see what makes a Neko Pokemon tick."

"What kind of tests?" asked Dawn, nervous.

"Oh, you have nothing to worry about it, Dawn." replied Rowen. he turned to Ash, who was already frightened. "Neither do you Ash. You see, because I know you were someone I knew, I will sedate you when I run the tests so you won't feel a thing!"

He then opens a drawer and pulls out a needle, filled with a clear liquid. "The sooner we start, the better."

Ash backs away frightened, Dawn tries to stand between you and the professor but he gently moves her aside and corners you.

"There's nothing to be afraid of, Ash." he said. "It's just a sedative. All it does is make you sleepy."

"But I don't want to be experimented on!" thought Ash.

He had to think fast. What will he do?

Ash knew that jumping out the window would only seal his fate as a Neko Pokemon. He had to stay near the rock to even have a chance to return to normal. So he decided it best to try one of his new Pokemon attacks. Unfortunately, he did not know what he could do as he was the first of his kind.

Ash tried a thunder punch maneuver, as he watched Pickachew do many times. He charged forward, running under Rowen's legs to give himself some room, then charged him again. Only, Rowen was ready for him with the syringe in hand. However, he was caught off guard as Ash suddenly jumped up and swung his tail at him.

"Neko!"

Ash expected his tail to glow and strike the professor with a heavy blow. But, instead, a number of needle like hairs fired from it. Rowen, showing fear for the first time, tried to dodge them only he ran into Dawn in his haste. The two fell to the floor in direct path of the needles.

The needles caught Dawn on the arm and she screamed out in a mixture of pain and fear. If Professor Rowen had not knocked her over, she would have been completely in the clear. Only now, she had no idea what was about to happen to her. She suddenly felt as if her entire body had turned into jelly as she could hardly move a muscle.

"I... I feel strange." she muttered.

Then, the changes occurred. Her hair turned from black to a light brown as she felt an itching in her head. Her human eyers moved up to the near top of her head then morphed into a large pair of cat like ears, allowing her to hear better than she ewer thought possible.

"This is so weird." she said, still barely able to move. "I...."

Then, Dawn screamed as a furry, light brown tail shot out, though her skin and quickly grew to a good length. At the same time, she shrank in size until her skirt fell off of her, revealing her panties. She pulled off her sweater, now way too big for her, revealing her new look.

"Don't you even think about it, professor!" screamed Dawn. "I am n-Neka!"

She slapped a hand over her mouth as she realized that she was no longer able to speak English!

"Over here, Dawn!" yelled Ash, in her new language. "We HAVE to get out of here!"

Dawn did not hesitate, they dodged the professor's attempt to capture them and jumped out the window with Pickachew close behind and ran out into the wild. Professor Rowen watched them flee, unaware that the stone was now in his pocket and it was starting to glow....

Four years later, word got out of a new race of Pokemon. Brock and Misty stumbled upon a pair of them with little ones following close behind while on one journey.

"Neko! Neka!"

1122.content: "Wait what about our Pokemon? Did they get affected as well?" Upon calling them out a massive sigh of relief came from them but they noticed something weird about pikachu. Yes it evolved but the way it looked was strange because it looked like an entirely different Pokemon. "What happened to you?" The newly evolved Pokemon spoke and surprised Alex by actually talking in the human tongue, "I have no idea but I can see that somehow the two of you fused. It seems during that time I evolved but into a form I was not expecting. Yes I am a Raichu but apparently a mutant form of it. I've discovered that somehow I'm now able to see auras and I can actually control my projectile attacks with my mind for some reason. Hmm since you are in one body now that is both genders you will need a new name, I got it! Alex! Its a name which is one of the few gender neutral names out there." The now named Alex said, "I like that name though to be honest speaking like I have voices at once is strange and weird because it makes me sound like I am echoing all the time." Just then Dextette registered the new Raichu and had different info than expectes. It said this: Alolan Raichu, a electric Psychic type Pokemon. This new version of Raichu sadly has no info on it. "Makes sense that it would say that. Hmm better call Professor Oak and tell him what happened. Good thing there is a phone with the function where both ends can see each other over there." Then Raichu said, "I do have a name myself and I am called Storm but maybe now I should be known as Psystorm." When Oak came on screen he was mystified to see Alex and even more upon seeing Psystorm. Upon returning to his senses Oak said, "Now this is a first for me seeing a human that is actually two in one body. Also there's a Pokemon I haven't seen before next to you." Alex sighed and said, "Its a Raichu." Oak said, "That's not what a Raichu looks like at all." Alex then brought out hir pokedex and pulled up the page with Psystorm on it. "It really is a Raichu after all. I admit I never saw a Pokemon that had the same evolution name but different shape until now." "Also it seems that strangely you can use twice as much Pokemon than the typical limit enforced which is a first then again you are as I said before a fused human so you are able to withstand the stress it puts. There are certain advantages I can come up with in your new form aside from that. One when you fight you should be able to process thoughts twice as fast and I think that you should be twice as powerful than before overall your physical and mental aspects are twice as good as it originally once was. I am very interested in this new phenomena now and will want to see you asap Professor Oak out!" "Okay now that we know of the positive aspects of this it isn't as bad and frankly being able to do things twice as easily is actually quite the advantage overall." Just then the boat arrived that would take them to Kanto. "Wanted to see my female half's parents but this event means that is out of the question. I suppose we should take the gem and depart." When Alex got onboard boy was shi in for a surprise because apparently 4 people were onboard. They were Ash's previous female traveling companions and apparently the champion of a region called Sinnoh alongside Sabrina. Just then the gem flashed again and this caused the 5 to fuse into one body that well viewers you will have to come up with it yourself. The new Alex looked at it's new form and realized that it was the gem that caused this to happen. If there was one thing going through the newly created being's mind it was simply "What the heck is going on?!" Eventually Alex calmed down realizing that this new body is as powerful as those that make it up combined. This also meant it could also have up to 36 Pokemon ready. "Man how will I explain to those waiting for me at home?" Just then a thought clicked in Alex's head, "I know! Maybe I can change forms between each one so those that I can't reveal this to won't know what happened and also what caused me to look like this." After thinking it long enough Alex turned into Ash, then to Dawn, then misty, as well as May, and finally Cynthia and Sabrina before going back to its true form. "That is good news for me." "I must be a sort of demigod at this point. Better take a look in a mirror as to what I look like though. Oh wow!" The clothing Alex wore was not what it was expecting at all. It was wearing some sort of dress that looked like it was flowing with each step. "Anyways I had better take a needed nap after this weird day." And Alex fell asleep.

The light envelopes both Ash and Dawn, however Ash returns to normal after only a second. Dawn is still all lit up, and Ash becomes worried.

Dawn can feel herself changing. The first thing she notices is her hair, which shoots up and becomes spiky and black. Her arms and legs are becoming much thicker, as is her chest - all except for her breasts, which regress into her torso, leaving her flat chested. Then, a patch forms over her vagina, only to be replaced by a penis.

The light begins to fade after a minute, and leaves Dawn bewildered. Ash, however, can only stand in shock. "Dawn, what's happened to you?" He asks shakily.

Dawn looks down at herself. Apart from the changes earlier, she notices she is wearing a black shirt with a white and black short sleeve shirt over the top. She sees a pair of light blue jeans on her legs, and a pair of white sneakers. She feels the top of her head, with hands covered in black and green gloves which don't cover the fingers, and pulls a cap off, which she notices is red except for at the front where a black patch is with a pokemon symbol squarely in the middle.

13133111.content:
Upon seeing the Evee emerge from the tall grass, Ash's instincts kicked in as he gripped the ball in his hand. Pulling his arm back he flung it with all his might at the unaware pokemon. The Evee turned it's head as it heard the commotion. As it say the ball speeding towards it, it only had enough time to let out a startled "Eve!" Before the ball smacked it in the head and bounced off. As the ball bounced back it opened up, shooting a red beam the engulfed the Evee, before pulling it inside the ball. As the ball closed and landed on the ground, the button in the center began to flash red while the ball rocked from side to side. As it did Ash and Pikachu watched with baited breath to see whether the Evee would be caught. Finally the ball stopped moving and with a click of the ball Ash Picked it up triumphantly shouting out, "I caught, an Evee!"
         After the thrill of the moment passed, Ash was left with the realization that he just used his friend to catch a pokemon without knowing what would happen to either. As he held the ball in his hand he was left with two choices: he could either open the ball to see what, or who, would pop out; or he could put the ball away and deal with it later. Which choice should he make?

14.content:
As the light began to engulf Ash and Dawn, the two of them began to lose consciousness...

Ash awoke a little while later with his face in the dirt. "Ugh... what happened?" He pulled himself up and stood up, and saw Dawn was not anywhere to be seen. "Dawn? Where are you?" He began to shout.

Dawn was immediately awoken by Ash's insistent screaming for her. But something felt odd: she felt her feet were... connected with the ground... As her sight came into focus, she saw she was at the edge of the path that she and Ash were walking down towards Sandgem. "Ash! I'm over here!" She tried to shout, but nothing came out. She tried to run after her friend, but she couldn't move. She was rooted to the spot. Quite literally, she found out, as she looked down to see her feet were roots! Her body was a moderately-sized trunk, covered in untouched bark, and her head and arms - which were branches - sported beautiful green leaves. Her face was non-existant, however, she could still see, hear and think, as well as feel the wind toss her immobile state around in the soft wind.

It took a while for it to dawn on her, but she realised that she had become a tree. "I don't want to be a tree!" Dawn cried in her head. "Oh, please, please let me out of here! I'd go insane if I was stuck like this forever!"
14.title: Dawn becomes a tree

Dawn was scared. Scared that she would be stuck in the immobile form of a tree for the rest of her life. She worried herself into the late afternoon, as the sun began to go down and disappear behind the mountains in the distance.

Suddenly, Ash came running past. "Ah... where could she be?" He said to himself. Just at that moment, Dawn felt her arms back again, and her roots were beginning to deroot and become feet again. I'm turning back into my old self again! She thought. As her face came back and her body returned to normal, the first thing she saw was Ash staring at her like she had a huge pimple on her face.

----------------

"And that's what happened. I turned back as soon as the sun went down."

Dawn was explaining her mysterious transformation to Ash, who seemed bewildered and unconvinced, despite the fact that he had seen it with his own eyes.

"I told you that stone was weird," Ash replied. "But why did you turn into a tree and I didn't?"

"I dunno."

"Well, that explains everything!"

The two decided to set up camp, and in the morning they would set out for Professor Rowan's to see if he had any insight.

1411.content:
As the sun rose over the forest, Dawn spread her eyes open as it glared at her. Well, she would have, if it weren't for the fact that she couldn't move again.

"Oh, damnit! I'm a tree again?!"

Ash woke up to see a tree in place of where Dawn was sleeping. "Oh, no, it happened again? Uh... Don't worry, I'm going to go get help! I'll go to Professor Rowan and get him! Just stay put!"

"No duhh! I can't do anything else!"

A few hours later, Ash returned with Professor Rowan, both heavily panting. "There she is! That's Dawn!" Ash exclaimed, pointing to Dawn in her tree form.

But Rowan was a little confused. "You mean, you brought me all the way out here just to show me some tree?"

"What? Wh... no! It's really her! She touched a stone and she turned into a tree, then she turned back last night and this mor..."

"A stone?" Rowan interrupted rudely but curiously.

"Well, yeah..."

"Do you still have it?"

Ash pointed to it - it was still lying on the road and he hadn't bothered to touch it again. He ran over to pick it up.

15211112.content:
Deciding to take the stone with them had seemingly been a bad idea. Not only had it caused them to swap genders, but now it was creating a whole new problem for the young trainers.

As Ash and Dawn walk through the forest, Ash can't help but think that the stone changed more than her body. She can't say quite what's off, but she knows that something besides her body has been altered.

She looks at Dawn, to see if he's acting any different, and a strange thought enters her head. "He's pretty cute." She stops, horror written on her beautiful face. Dawn senses that Ash stopped, and turns around. "What's up Ash?" The two had agreed to use their old names when they were alone.

"Nothing, just... Thinking about something." She replies timidly. "Well c'mon. We gotta get to Professor Rowan's lab so we can fix this problem!" "Ok, I-I'll catch up in a sec."

Dawn studies her for a second. "Are you ok? You've been acting kinda odd since the change." "I'll be fine! Please! Stop asking questions!" Ash shouts, feeling a bit flustered. Dawn starts to walk away. "Well, if you insist..."

Ash looks around, and is suddenly scared of being away from Dawn. "Wait up!" She yells, running as fast as she can in her new, weaker body. Dawn can't help but smile at her as she tries to catch up to him.

Just then, a huge, bearded man comes roaring out of the bushes, and begins to shout at the transformed trainers. "Given me that stone! I must have the stone!"

Ash cries out in fear and clutches tightly to Dawn's arm, burying her face in his shoulder. Dawn gets angry at the stranger for scaring her. "And what do you need it for? It just so happens that we need this stupid thing as well!"

The man growls. "If you won't be cooperative..." He says in a low, dangerous voice, "I'll just have to take it from you!" He pulls out a Pokeball.

"It's on, old man!" Dawn shouts back. The two begin battling for possession of the stone. The duel is long and fierce, but eventually one triumphs.

15533222222111222222.content: Let's take a break from that monotony. How about if Ash were to become a Pikachu and Dawn to become a Buneary?
15533222222111222222.title: Timeout

155332222221112222221.content: As the light from the stone grew brighter, both Ash and Dawn felt more and more pain. Both of them felt a strange, fuzzy feeling as if they were both being covered in fur. A sharp pain from their rear ends brought tails. Their ears were forcing themselves upwards and lenghtening. Their bones rearranged themselves, causing a great deal of shrinking. By the time the transformations were complete, Ash and Dawn had been knocked out from the strain. Before they wake up, I have one question. Are Dawn's Buneary and Ash's Pikachu nearby?
155332222221112222221.title: At Last!

1553322222211122222211.content: then soon pikachu and bunneary come back from a small walk they look for their owners when they see a male pikachu and a female bunneary they run over and wake them up they groan and say "pikachu"? "bunneary"? then pikachu <--female bunneary <--male say "ash" "dawn" and they explain their story to them they go and retrieve the stone and they head off before running to.....
1553322222211122222211.title: Sure.

155332222221122222221.content:
Both ash and dawn blacked out right after the light stopped.
*When they woke up*
Ash woke up, sat up and rubbed his head.
"Ugh what happened?"
Ash suddenley jumped when he felt a weird V shaped thing on his head. He tried to reach up further but found out his arm's were to short.
"W....what's wrong with my arms?!?" Ash brout his arms up to his eye's and saw his hand's were orange and where his arm's were their were two light yellow puffy things.
Ash saw a puddle near so he ran quite clumsily to it, Only then noticing his liegs were light yellow and puffy just like his arm's. Ash got to the puddle only to see the reflection of a victini.
"I....I've become a victini!!!"
"Uh..Where am I?" Ash turned around only then noticing the mew the was supposedly there all along.
"Who are you?" The mew questioned. Ash realised the mew had Dawn's voice.
"Dawn? is that you?" Ash asked the mew
"Ash? It's me dawn!" The mew revealed herself to be Dawn, Just as confused as Ash.
"Dawn you're a mew!" Ash said
"And you're a victini!" Dawn said
The two were interupted by a russling coming from the bush near them.
What is it?
155332222221122222221.title: The night of the legendary pokemon

she sighed as she stripped off her clothes and underware, she put on a bathrobe and headed for the shower in her room.she had gotten a nice room in snowportcity, it had a grand overview of most of the city and the snow covered plains. as she showered may breathed a sigh, thease were one few moments she could get away from the public eye, she sigh again and remember years ago traveling the regoins around the world with her friends, she missed those times and yeared for them greatly at this point in her life. but her thoughts were soon broken by a knocking on the door of her room. turning off the water, she stepped out of the shower a grabbed her bathrobe putting it of as she went to her rooms door. grasping the knob and opening the door may was soon met by a familar blue haired girl.

'hey may!' dawn chirped.

'dawn!' may responsed in excitement.'what are you doing here?' she asked as she let dawn into the room.

'just visiting an old and deliverivering a package!' dawn said happyly, holding out a small brown box to may along with a letter.

'whos this from?' may questioned, taking the items from dawn.

'well i ran into wallace in the city, and since he knew me i guess as one of your freinds and he seemed to be in a hurry, he let me know you were in town and asked me to delver it." she responsed.

"well if its from Wallace I better address it right away, if you'll excuse me for now dawn, please make your self at home." may said and dawn nodded inresponse. may went back to her room and shut the door behind her. Walking over to a desk in her room may set the letter down and began to silently open the small box. Opening it may removed a small black pen.

May blink not really sure what to make of it. "Why did wallace want to get this to me?" She wondered sitting down in a wooden chair may sat the pen aside and cut open the letter. And it read.

'Dear may,

I'm truly sorry how thease past few weeks have going for you, I've been caught in the current spot spotlight and haven't noticed how tried you were. So I am giving you a break from the rest of the tour, now to help you get a good vacation away from the public eye, enclosed in that box is a pen but it is no ordinary pen, it's has the power to turn anyone into a costume, now please enjoy your break and have fun and use the pen wisely.

From wallace.

May sat still for a moement in complete disbelief, at what her letter was telling her* she picked up the pen and rolled it around in her hand. She noticed that it had two little red and green buttons on it.one said suit and the other said memory. Truly may thought this might be some sort of trick wallace was playing on her.

Although she did have a course side about this pen, and dawn was right in the other room so why not may figured.why not soon enough may had walked into the other room and silently pointed the pen at the fifteen year old, who was looking out the window and shot her, instantly dawn just seemed to collaspe into herself, this greatly shocked may.

155332222222222222222221222221121.content:
The stone had vanished from thin air in a violent explosion. Fragments blasted the pair in the face and they were both knocked to their butts.

"Wha- where did it go Ash?" asked Dawn, feeling her where the stone fragments had hit.

"I don't know, it just exploded and-"

Ash paused and noticed Dawn was wearing different clothing that looked too large for her. She had on a white sweater, complete with a pinkish apron, blue jeans, and pink slippers. They looked strangely like her mother's clothes. But before Ash could say anything to her, she gasped and pointed to Ash.

"Ash! You're in your mom's clothing!"

Ash looked down and saw a familiar pink short sleeved jacket with one big button that his mother often wore. Below that his t-shirt had turned into a yellow tank top. His jeans had shortened and become a bright blue skirt, which gave off a nice breeze. His feet were squished into a pair of thin white slip on shoes. Even his underwear had changed into his mother's bra and panties.

"Holy crap!", yelled Ash, "Dawn your clothes changed too!"

She looked down and yelped in surprise. What on earth had that stone done to them?
155332222222222222222221222221121.title: Clothing as well.

1553322222222222222222212222211211.content:
Ash looked as something in Dawn's hair moved. It came to him that her hair wasn't moving, it was changing! Dawn noticed the change too and grabbed a fist fill of hair as her hair puffed up into a circular shape. It was the same style as her mother's. A little red haircut appeared on the left of her head, holding up the hair that was in her eyes.

"Oh! Ash...!" she pointed at his head.

Sure enough his black hair was becoming orange like his mother's. His spiky hair flattened and migrated to the back of his neck in a ponytail. A little antenna like strand of hair poked up in the middle of his new crease of orange hair. He could also feel all the body hair on him being sucked back into his arms and pits. He almost looked like a miniature version of his mother and he was dreading the change that would come next...
1553322222222222222222212222211211.title: A new doo for the crew.

15533222222222222222222122222112111.content:
A new tickling feeling appeared in his groin as Ash quickly grabbed his manhood only to find it to be much smaller than he remembered it.

"It's disappearing!", he said in a much higher voice.

"What is-Ah Ahhhh!" yelled Dawn, as she began to grow in height.

Ash's arms and legs were becoming smaller and smoother. His legs also extended themselves, increasing his height to match Dawn's. He watched his man hand's compress to his gentle hard working mother's hands. There was a jolt as his stomach was sucked in to a tone woman's. His body fat began to concentrate on his hips and his new forming breasts. Dawn wasn't having a much easier time as Ash watched her go through early puberty right before his eyes.

His feet were now comfortably fitting into his new shoes and the changes worked their way up to his head. His neck shrunk a little as his voice box was replaced with his mother's. He could feel his facial features become smoother and his chin became less broader. When the tingling finally stopped for both of them, they gave a huge sigh of relief.

"Ash, what happened to us?" asked in her mother's voice.

155332222222222222222221222221121111.content:
Before Ash could answer Dawn, there was a giant bright gloom that filled the air followed by a loud explosion noise. Ash tried to keep his eyes open but he couldn't help but blackout. When he woke up he was on his mother's bed and still in his her body as well.

"What the?" he said aloud, "Why am I home?"

There was a scuffling noise as a Mr.Mime appeared and walked down the hallway, cleaning everything in sight. It was his mother's assistant and pokemon Mimey. Maybe it would know something about what just happened. He got up and walked into the hallway when he heard someone call.

"Hello? Is someone there?"
155332222222222222222221222221121111.title: There's no place like home.

1553322222222222222222212222211211111.content:
"Anyone home? Delia? The front door was open so I let myself in." It was Professor Oak, the local Pokémon expert. Ash walked down the stairs to greet him.

"Ah there you are Delia! I was looking for you. You see a colleague of mine named Bill sent me a new invention of his. I was wondering if you'd like to test it with me."

Ash tried to sound like a convincing fake of his mother. "Oh uh...certainly Professor Oak. I was just, uh, making the beds upstairs."

"Oh please Delia, we haven't been neighbors for years for nothing. It's Samuel."

Ash felt a sweat drop coming down the back of his head. But before he could respond, Oak had grabbed him by the hand and was leading him back to his lab. It seemed a lot smaller than it first was when he had just turned ten and started his Pokémon journey. The lab was a mess as usual, but there were many new machines around. One of which was the large tank that Oak had brought him in front of.

"Now Delia. This is Bill's latest work. The transformer. It allows any person to enter it and come out as whatever they like. It's supposed to be reversible so don't worry."

A thought occurred in Ash's head. "Um Prof-I mean, Samuel. Would it be possible for me to enter and come out as my son, for example?"

"Eh? Well that's an odd idea. But yes I suppose so. It was meant for Pokémon research but I guess that's possible. Would you like to give that a try?"

Ash nodded and stepped into the chamber of the tank. Oak threw the switch and the door slammed shut. Gears in the machine began to twirl and a flash light filled the room. When it was done...

Ash and Dawn stood there as Delia continued talking, "I see you let yourself in, Ashley." She turned to Dawn, "And this must be your friend Dawn. It's nice to meet you. I'm Ashley's sister, Delia Ketchum. You two must be tired from all your traveling. Just let me set these groceries down and I'll whip us up some lunch, okay?" She headed to the kitchen, leaving Ash and Dawn standing there stunned.

"Did... did she call me sister?" stammered Ash.

"Uhhuh," replied Dawn. "This is really weird."

Ash nodded, "Yeah. We should do something." Her stomach growled, "Maybe after lunch."

Dawn almost collapsed to the floor.

**

The lunch Delia Ketchum prepared them was a truly generous spread of salads and vegetables of all types. She and Dawn ate politely, but Ash dug into the food in his usual function. Dawn cleared her throat.

"Hmm?" Ash looked up to see Delia and Dawn staring at her. Ash laughed nervously, "Oh, sorry about that." She wiped her mouth with a napkin and began to eat more quietly.

Delia turned to Dawn, still smiling, "So, Ashley told me you have an identical twin too?"

Dawn nearly choked. "Oh, you mean m- Johanna?"

"That's right." Delia laughed softly, "People are always saying that me and Ashley may look alike but that we act a lot different. Is it the same with you and Johanna?"

"Yes," answered Dawn. "Well... maybe. M-My sister was a Pokemon coordinator." She pushed her food around, uncomfortable at the added similarity between her and her mother.

"I see." Delia frowned, "Is something wrong with the food?"

"No, no. The food's great. I guess I'm just nervous," answered Dawn.

"Don't worry about it, Dawn. I just know you and Ashley are going to do just fine-"

1553322222222222222222212222211211112222.content:
Ash (now Ashley) and Dawn looked at each other, having no idea what to say.

Delia tried to re-assure them, “Don't worry. I know it seems hard, but as I said, I just know you'll do fine. Oh, and be sure to show me the house once you're all settled in.”

“House?” Dawn said weakly.

“Yeah. You know, that red one with the “Just sold” sign?” Delia sighed nostalgically, “I remember when I was young and just learning about the responsibilities of adulthood. Just do your best and let me know if you need anything.”

Ashley and Dawn finished their meal in silence. “Th-Thank you, Ms. Ketchum,” said Dawn.

“Oh please, call me Delia. And leave the dishes to me.”

As the two left the kitchen table, they found two purses. One was red, the other blue.

“Those aren't mom's,” said Ashley.

Dawn facepalmed, “No, those would be ours.”

Ashley's jaw dropped.

*

Inside the purses were personal identification, house keys, and their Pokeballs.

They found the house, just as Delia had told them. Ash took a deep breath and stepped forward, “Well, might as well see our new house.”

Ash opened the door. The house was modest and sparsely furnished. There was Pokemon paraphernalia and family pictures all around the house that depicted them as if this had been their lives all along.

“I just.... I'm going to bed,” said Ash.

**

1553322222222222222222222221.content:
There was a brilliant flash. Once it was over, it took Ash and Dawn a moment to be able to see again.

"What was that all about?" they asked in unison.

They turned to each other and laughed.

"That was weird." they said, again, in unison.

"Hey!" said Dawn. "Are you making fun of me?"

"That's just what I was about to ask." said Ash.

The two looked at the rock then turned to each other, concerned.

"Maybe the rock made us think alike." suggested Dawn.

"I'm not sure." said Ash. "I know I don't care for skirts or dresses."

"Well, at least I still do." said Dawn, with a sigh of relief.

"So, what happened?"

Then, Pickachew ran out from for somewhere and jumped into Dawn's arms.

"Picka!" he said, giving a happy face.

"Hey Pickachew!" said Dawn, with an air of excitement. "What's up, boy?"

Ash turned to Dawn, confused. "Huh?"

Pickachew turned to Ash then to Dawn then to Ash agin, clearly confused.

"Pickachew?"

He jumped down then sniffed them both and scratched his head.

"Picka? Pickachew?"

Then it hit them and they both placed a single hand on their head, pointing at each other as they gave out a long yell of surprise.

"You think just like me!" yelled Ash. "So much so, Pickachew is having a hard time telling us apart!"

"Does that mean I'm going to become you!?!" asked Dawn.

She shivered at the thought.

"My question is, will I start thinking like you?"

Then the rock glows again.

What happens?

After sharing a passionate kiss, the rubber Pikachu and Buneary scurried away into the woods to live out a new life with each other. That night, many Pokemon and humans swore they heard a lot of squeaking from deep in the woods, but no one discovered a thing. Years pass as people continue to look for the two trainers who seemingly vanished off the face of the earth while the two rubber Pokemon continue to live together far from society along with a baby rubber Buneary that they love so very much and would help raise. Eventually, the search for the two trainers was called off and many more years would pass, though time ignored the rubber Pokemon family as they continued to live in the forest, being able to avoid the trainers that would come into the forest searching for Pokemon to catch. Meanwhile, at Celadon Gym Erika was calmly sitting at her desk, looking over schedule. She had an important meeting soon...

There was a bright flash of light, and Erica fell from her seat in shock. One of the gym attendants heard her and rushed in.

1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.content:
Ericka let out a low scream of surprise as she found her sandals and ankle high socks vanishing, leaving her feet bare for a moment before being replaced with shin high socks and a pair of boy's tennis shoes.

"What's going on!?!" asked her assistant, surprised.

"Someone mush have found the transformation stone." said Ericka.

"The what?"

"It's a long story, Emily." said Ericka. "Needless to say, this stone transforms anyone who comes into contact with it. But, because I have had the stone myself for so long, it occasionally changes me as well, if I'm in range of its power."

"Is there any way to reverse this?" asked Emily.

Ericka shook her head. "I wish there was. Right now, we can only wait until the change runs its course and go from there."

Meanwhile, several hundred yards away, Ash let out a yell of his own as he found his sneakers and socks vanish, leaving his feet bare for a moment before they were replaced with ankle high socks and a pair of sandals.

"The stone is changing me again!" he yelled.

Dawn looked at him thoughtfully. "Somehow, I think this is different." she said. "Normally, your clothing changes into another type. But now, it's like your swapping with someone."

"That's weird." said Ash. "I wonder what the stone has in mind."

Then, Ash felt a breeze as his pants vanished, revealing his white briefs. Dawn blushed and giggled before turning away then turned back as she heard Ash give a yell of protest. He was now wearing a long red skirt.

"That looks like gym leader Ericka's skirt." she said.

"Then lets get to her so we can switch back." said Ash.

The two hurried towards Ericka's gym as their clothing continued to change places.

Back to Ericka, she let out a scream as her skirt vanished, revealing her pink panties, then screamed again as a boy's pair of pants appeared in its place.

"Who are you being swapped with?" asked Emily.

"I'm sure I don't know." replied Ericka. "But, who ever it is, I'm sure he's just as annoyed by this development."

Then, she felt her panties vanish, only to be replaced with a boy's pair of briefs. She gave a heavy shiver of disgust as she felt the cloth touching her.

"It's not the boy's fault." she told herself. "It's not his fault."

Ash let out a shiver of disgust of his own as he felt the lace panties pressed against his groin and quickened his step, trying to get to Ericka before another transformation could begin.

As they got closer, Ash felt a bra tightening around his chest and nearly fell over in surprise.

"What's wrong?" asked Dawn, looking back at him.

"A bra just appeared around me chest!" complained Ash. "I don't want to be a girl again!"

"And what's wrong with being a girl?" asked Dawn, annoyed.

"Nothing!" countered Ash. "It's just not for me, okay?"

Dawn's face softened. "Fair enough. Come on, we're almost there."

Inside Ericka's gym, she watched her long, ceremonial rope top vanish as a simple white T-shirt appeared in its place. Tears began to form in her eyes as she thought of what might come next.

"Hang in there, leader Ericka." said Emily. "I have a feeling this is almost over."

Ericka sadly shook her head. "No, Emily. I have a sinking feeling that this is just the beginning."

Back to Ash, he felt a breeze on his chest as his bra was revealed to the open long enough for Dawn to see and giggle before Ericka's rope top appeared over it.

"The change is almost over!" said Dawn. "We have to hurry before another transformation can begin!"

The two ran through the front doors as Ash's cap vanished and was replaced with a red hair band. They entered the main arena where they found Ericka, in Ash's clothing, near the verge of tears.

"Ash Katchem!" she yelled. "Give me back my clothes this instant!"

"You give me mine!" countered Ash.

"There's no time for this!" yelled Dawn, pushing Ash forward. "I will give Ericka her clothing after Ash strips down and Emily can push Ash's clothing under the door. Move!"

Ash and Ericka ran into the next room, which was a water arena, and each entered one of many changing rooms. They made quick work of changing clothing and were soon switched back.

"Well, I'm glad this was fixable." said Dawn after seeing Ash and Ericka in their own clothing again.

Ash and Ericka both shivered off a certain coldness. "I am so going to take a shower!" they said in unison.

They smiled and turned to each other.

"Don't say it!" yelled Dawn and Emily in unison.

But it was too late. The two said, "Jinx." at the same time and the transformation rock glowed again.

What happens next?

As the light dimmed, Ash quickly realised he was no longer in the forest. In fact, he was in some kind of massive dojo, and he noticed dozens of men and women lined up in front of him. All of them were dressed the same, blue martial arts gis with yellow obis. Ash quickly recognised his new location: it was the Battle Arena of the Battle Frontier.

He glanced around, trying to figure out when he got there, when a voice caught his attention.

"Hey, Greta. Is everything okay?"

Ash turned, and found himself facing one of the martial artists; this one was of a higher rank, as evidenced by his black belt.

Ash blinked for a minute, as he realised he'd just been called Greta. He glanced down and quickly realised he was wearing a blue spandex jumpsuit, along with a pink and black shirt tied with a white obi.

It didn't take him long to recognise these clothes as those of the famous Arena Tycoon Greta.

"Greta!" the man repeated, catching Ash's attention. "I know you're a busy woman, but you should know that..."

1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.content:
[Decided to change the setting for this story]

One day, as Ash and Dawn were traversing a cool inland desert. "You know, for a desert, it isn't all that hot!!" Dawn laughs.

"Well, it's still a big desert, and the nearest Pokemon center is at on oasis village a few miles from here, so still got a ways to go." Suddenly a Steelix leaps out and attacks. The upblast of sand throws Dawn down the dune and into the the cave the Steelix had tunneled out moments ago.

"Ow..." Dwn moaned, rubbing her backside as she gets up. She can hear Ash fighting off the Steelix, and from it sounds like, winning, from the tunnel. "She notices something is still poking her butt, despite getting up. "What's still jabbing me..." She reaches back and feels something on her butt under her skirt, then reaches under and pulls out a shimmering gem that somehow slid in her underwear as she rolled and slid down the dune. "Every now and then I question wearing this thing..." she says dusting off her skirt seat, "...but only sometimes." she finishes with a smile. "Now what do we have here?" she adds, looking at the gem. "It sure is pretty enough... I think I'll keep it..." She puts it in her bag, not noticing its luster increasing ever so.

"Hey Dawn, where are you?!" she heard Ash cry out.

"Down here!!"

Moments later, after Ash used his Torterra to pull her out of the hole, he asked, "Are you alright?"

"Yeah!! I'm fine!!"

"Well, the Steelix won't be giving us any more trouble, so we should be able to head on the center an make it there before nightfall..."

"Right!!" As Dawn and Ash headed back up the dune, what Dawn didn't realize that on her bum under her skirt where the gem had been touching her, she had a red rash, but not from the friction of sliding on sand and rock. Instead, in the middle, a tiny cluster of gold scales were popping out of her flesh...

1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.content:
The light dies down, and the two look around confused. "What was that all about?" Ash asks.

"I don't know." Dawn says. "But I'm sure it was nothing." Deciding she wanted to keep it, Dawn picks up the rock and puts it into her bag.

"Come on, lets get going." Ash says, and the two hurry off.

---

"Look Dawn! Theres Pallet Town!" Ash says excitedly, happy to be back home again. After stopping in on Professor Rowan, and then Dawn's mother, the two boarded a boat, and after a long trip were finally arriving at Pallet Town.

After the ship docked at the port, the two made their way into town, with Ash telling Dawn about it.

"And heres my house!" Ash said as he identified his house. He then looked around. "Thats strange. Usually Mr. Mime would be out here doing chores."

"Maybe hes inside."

"Probably."

"SURPRISE!" several people shouted out as the door opened. Ash looked over and saw his mother, Professor Oak, Tracey, and Mr. Mime, as well as Brock, May, and Misty.

"Hey! Whats everyone doing here?" Ash said, happy to see everyone.

"We heard from Brock that you were on your way back, so we decided to surprise you." his mother explained. "And May and Misty were in the area, so they decided to join us."

1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.content:
As Ash and Dawn continued down the path the stone is Dawns hand suddenly began to glow, they both looked at it in wonder as suddenly it flashed so brightly both of them where blinded. As Ash opened his eyes again he noticed he was no longer with dawn, but in another route. He got up and looked around, he was sure he had seen this area before on his travels. He snapped his fingers as he say a ryhorn "Ah yes i remember, this looks like the safari zone from kanto, but how did i get here, that stone but be a kind of teleportation item"

As he wondered how this could of happened he failed to notice his body slowly change, His structure becoming shorter and shorter. Deciding it would be best to get to a phone to call Dawn Ash began to search for an exit from the Safari zone. as he walked along he continued to shrink, his clothes feeling oddly loose on his body. Cute pink fur began to slowly grow on his hands. However it didn’t stay there as it began to crawl up his arm, slowly covering Ash's body in short pink fur. Ash scratched his arm, feeling a slight itch and jumped in shock as he felt the feeling of fur against fur, He stared at his arms as it spread onward to his chest, already covering his legs. "What’s going on?" Ash shivered, feeling the last of the pink fur cover every inch of his body "The stone must cause hallucinations that must be it" he told himself, not willing to believe what had just happened.

Ash sat down trying to rethink the situation, he couldn’t go past the guards’ a big pink fluffed human, he would have to wait till night if he didn’t want to make a fool of himself. As he sat there his body suddenly burst into change, His arms and legs began to shrink at a alarming rate, making ash yelp, as he reached the size of a Chansey. His trousers and boxers slid of with the size change making Ash blush as he tried to get up to put them back on but as he tried to take a step his changing legs made him slap. He looked back just in time to see his 2 legs disappear and leaving his feet, which changed too as the toes merged together into big waddle feet, a darker shade of pink then the rest of his body, his arms had shrunk too, now mere stubs.

Ash was freaking out, now calling for help, but nowone but the other safari pokemon could hear him. Without warning his body began to feel under pressure, but also bloated at the same time. suddenly Ash’s head began to push down, making him grunt with fear as his head and torso formed into one shape. As his nose began to disappear his body began to grow again, but this time not in size but in weight. His stomach grumbled as he got fatter and fatter. his entire body was changing shape. He continued to fatten until he was almost like the shape of a big egg. His hair suddenly shuffled and split as it moved to the sides of his head, as they grew out into long strands of pink hair. His stomach itched horrible as Ash scratched it, suddenly feeling his egg pouch grow, he stared down over his round body not recognizing what his body was "I-Im becoming a Chansey?" He stuttered hardly believing his eyes, he suddenly doubled in pain as a short tail began to grow right above his rear.

Ash looked exactly like a Chansey now, however nature had to make the new Chansey in the image of other Chanseys. Ash groaned suddenly feeling a pressure in his groin area. He wriggled and moaned loudly, as his penis disappeared into him, his insides reforming into female reproductive organs With all Chanseys being 100% female Ash didn’t have much chance of escaping his, or rather HER new future as a female. Ash panted heavily feeling the last changes in her body take place that allowed her to lay many eggs. As the changes in her body finally came to an end, Ash pushed himself into a sitting position again looking over her new body "Ohgod what happened to me. im a Chansey, a-and female....i need to find dawn or get to professor oak before its to late." She said in a clearly higher pitched voice as she got up and tried once more to find a way out of there.

1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.content:
Ash was clearly shocked after the immense changes that had just gone through her body. Not only was she no longer human, but she was no longer even male. She waddled about awkwardly, her feet making cuteish squeaking noises as her head tassels swished about some. She huffed and puffed to herself as she pouted a little but, "This is so embarrassing...becoming a Chansey like this! I'm supposed to become a pokemon master not a pokemon!" She whimpered a little as she waddled through the high grass, suddenly spotting a human shape nearby. "H...hey! Someone's here! Maybe they can help! Ash would waddle closer, waving her stubby little arms softly, trying to get the figure's attention.

Of course this would prove to be the opposite of what Ash wanted however. She would be noticed, but unfortunately the figure in question was that of a familiar looking pink haired woman in a nurse's uniform. It was a Nurse Joy, or one of her sisters at least. The woman smiled warmly as she laid her eyes on the Chansey, her hand softly against her face, "Oh my goodness! Just what I was looking for, how lucky am I?" Joy smiled happily, placing her hand on her set of safari balls, tossing one suddenly at the pokegirl!

Ash would blink some, still waving her arms some, "Hey! I need some help, can you hear me?!" Ash would frown a little, wondering why the woman wasn't paying attention before suddenly feeling an odd sensation. Her body seemed to flash red as she gasped in surprise, finding herself being sucked downward into a strange spherical object, though it wouldn't be hard for her to realize what it was, "A..ah! A safari ball?!"

Joy watched eagerly as the Chansey was sucked inside the ball, the sphere softly beginning to wriggle one time...

Ash was fighting her hardest to get out, but would find it incredibly hard to do so. She wriggled as good as she could, her arms flailing within the ball as she whimpered some, "N..no way this can't be...I can't be caught!"

Joy's smile grew wider as she tensed up on the second wriggle...

Ash continued to fight, trying her best to escape the ball. She didn't want to be someone's pokemon...she didn't want to be a Chansey! She didn't want any of this!

CLICK! Nurse Joy squealed in delight as she rushed over, picking the ball up in her hands and gushing over it. "I did it! I got a Chansey all my own! Now I can finally start my own Pokecenter! Hehe, maybe I should let her out to thank her..."

Joy threw up the ball and released her new Chansey. As Ash re-appeared she looked around slightly confused before Joy came out of nowhere and hugged her "Oh my god, thanks for being my Pokemon Chansey!" she giggled happily still not believing she had found a Chansey this easily. Ash's face blushed a little at this sudden hug before she flailed her short arms again "Nonono im no a Chansey, im a human cant you help me please I don’t want to be a pokemon" she winced, However Joy didn’t seem to understand what she was saying, all that was coming out of Ash's mouth was her name: Chansey.

Ash wanted to run away, she most definitely didn’t want to become a nurse, she wanted to be a pokemon master. But for some reason when she wanted to run her big feet didnt respond, She was Joys pokemon now and she only be able to run away if ordered to do so or if she released her, but what where the chances of someone releasing a Chansey, a pokemon as rare as she was. Joy broke the hug and petted Ash, sending mixed feelings of pleasure threw her body as she accidentally giggled cutely in response to it making Ash blush even more. Joy giggled too and walked to the exit of the safari zone "C’mon Chansey we need to get our centre started up" she chimed as Ash couldn’t do anything but follow.

As they walked threw town Ash felt more and more embarrassed at everyone looking at her, seeing she had no clothes on, and looked so cute and fluffy. Ash sighed at his reflection, seeing himself dressed as a girl once again. He sighed and cautiously started to exit, praying the boy wasn't hanging around...

"Temari..."

Ash froze, as a quiet, sinister voice seemed to echo throughout the hall. He turned and found himself face to face with another boy, younger than the one who he had encountered earlier. This one was dressed in brown, and had short red hair. His eyes were what intrigued Ash most; they were encircled in black, as if he wore too much eyeliner.

"...Kankuro told me he heard you screaming." the boy stated calmly. His voice was cold and terrifying, yet it seemed to bear no actual hostility towards Ash.

"Uh... y-yeah..." Ash murmured, looking for an excuse. "I... I saw a spider."

Ash mentally slapped himself as the boy raised a non-existant eyebrow.

"You have never been afraid of spiders before, Temari..." Ash started to panic, but the boy chose not to push it in further.

"Anyway, you'd best be getting ready. Baki will be here soon."

Ash was tempted to ask who Baki was, but realised that this might raise suspicion.

"Where am I...?" he asked aloud. He stood up out of the chair he found himself in, but wobbled unsteadily. Looking down, he saw why; his feet were strapped into a pair of black high heeled sandals, which let him see his toenails were now painted a cherry red. He also noticed that he was wearing a pair of dark blue women's trousers.

Running as fast as he could in his heels, Ash quickly found a mirror on the wall and was horrified upon seing himself. A grey kimono-like blouse covered his torso, with a dark obi keeping it closed. But what really scared hm was the way his face had been made up; bright red lipstick matching his toenails (and, he soon noticed, his fingernails) and black eyeliner made his face look more feminine, as did the two short ponytails his hair had been tied into.

Ash panicked and started to look around; he couldn't let anyone see him like this!

1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.content:
After the stone stopped shining, he awoke to hear a blonde boy, about his age talking.

"Hey Pervy Sage! Wake up already!" The kid said. He was blonde with blue eyes and was wearing an orange jumpsuit. He also looked a bit worried "Geez! One minute your talking, the next your out."

"Huh Who're you...?" Ash aske as he arose from off the ground. He noticed he was wearing strange clothes and was in a building of somesort.

"Naruto Uzumaki, your pupil, the future Hokage of Konoha, y'know?" Naruto explained. Ash was still groggy and trying to figure this all out as he barely got to his feet.

"Konoha? Hokage? Is that like a Pokemon Master?"

"...You must not be feeling well. I better take you to see Granny Tsunade!" Naruto exclaimed, grabbing Ash's hand and dragging him along.

"W-wait! Hold on now!" The pokemon trainer exclaimed as he was dragged. It was hard walking in his new, strange shoes while still disoriented.

As Naruto took him up a flight of stairs, Ash began to wonder where Pikachu and Dawn were. Finally, at the top of the stairs, Naruto and Ash saw some doors.

Naruto opened them and yelled: "Granny Tsunade, something's wrong with Pervy Sage!"

Ash saw that he was talking to...
1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.title: Pervy Pokemon master.

1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.content:
Just as he was about to see who the blonde was talking to, Naruto gave Ash a good shove into the room and he landed face-first into something soft. Muffled, Ash tried to break his face away from whatever he landed in. To his shock and embarrassment, he was groping a rather large pair of breasts that belonged to...Dawn!!!??? At least, her face and hair were just like Dawn's but the woman's body was completely different. More mature one might say.

'Dawn' sighed, grabbed Ash by the collar and tossed Ash on a nearby couch with a frightening amount of strength as Naruto stood in the doorway snickering. She pointed at the boy and said.

"Jiraiya appears to have had a little too much to drink, Naruto. I'll deal with him." She slammed the door shut.

She turned to face Ash and he weakly put up his hands in defense. "P-please, I'm sorry Miss! I-I didn't mean to land on you like that! I don't even know where I am!"

Suddenly, the woman laughed. "Relax Ash, I know it's you. It's good to see you again, for days now I thought I was stuck here alone."

"D-Dawn? So it is you! I almost didn't recognize you for a second!"

Dawn laughed again and held up her chest. "You must mean these. You're one to talk about hard to recognize, Mister. Grey-hair."

"What?" Ash looked in the mirror in the room and saw himself. He was in the some pretty goofy looking traditional Japanese clothing. But the most distinguished feature was his hair, now long and white like an old man's. He grabbed a handful of it to see if this was for real.

"I'm...old!"

"Yep, a little over fifty as a matter of fact. The person they see me as, Lady Tsunade, is apparently the same age as you. According to Naruto's big mouth though, she uses some sort of anti-age magic to hide it though. A little deceitful if you ask me."

"Wait, Dawn what's going on? And why do you know so much about this place?"

She sighed. "Let me explain then. Apparently when you touched the stone we both got wrapped to this alternate dimension, filled with ninjas."

"N-ninjas? What about Pokemon?"

"They don't exist here."

"Great." Thought Ash. "So much for seeing Pikachu and the others."

Dawn continued. "I woke up about a week ago like...this. And slowly tried to piece together what happened and where we are. Seems like I'm some sort of leader for a village of these guys. You on the other hand are an old hermit and a teacher for that Naruto kid."

Ash interrupted. "How come I had to be the hermit..."

Dawn stared back at him with a glare. "Would you like to switch? These things are killing me..."

Sweat-dropping, Ash calmly replied. "No thanks...But that doesn't answer the biggest question. How do we get back home?"

"Well, I was kind of waiting for you this whole time hoping you still had that stone. You have it right?"

"Umm..." Ash quickly checked his pockets.

As the bright light died down, Ash almost instantly noticed that his location had changed. He looked around, and found that he was in an unfamilliar location. It appeared to be some kind of a camp ground. And looking around, saw that Dawn was nowhere to be seen. "What just happened?" he wondered to himself.

It was then that he saw that his clothes had changed. Instead of his own, he was now wearing a red dress with a belt around his waist, a pair of brown gloves on his hands, a pair of white and brown girls shoes, and on his head was a feminine pink cowboy-like hat on his head. He was dressed like a girl! He was very embarrassed by this. "What is going on here? Why am I suddenly dressed like this?" he wondered.

As he stood there in confusion, he noticed something strange. It was something that he would not expect to see consider how hot it felt. He watched as a snowflake fell down from the sky and land on the ground. And that wasn't all. Several more followed after it. And as that happened, the temperature suddenly shifted dramatially, and it became freezing. He gripped himself, and shivered. Wondering what to do, he saw another girl running towards him. Ash became embarrassed at being seen like this, but before he could say anything, the girl grabbed his wrist and dragged her with him.

"C'mon Mimi! We've got to get out of this blizzard!" the girl said as she pulled him into a cabin.

"Why did she just call me 'Mimi'?" Ash thought to himself in confusion.

Congratulations! You are now the proud temporary owner of your own Never Ending Reformation Dominance doll.

This once human being can be changed into any Pokemon you wish him to be. You may also change him into any age, gender, or height you wish until the power of the stone's spell wears off in one week.

1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.content:
Dawn could feel the beams of light radiating all over her form, feeling some movement below her skirt. Without warning, she felt her panties change texture and become thick. She had done enough baby-sitting to know that she was wearing a diaper, even if she had not experienced the feeling of wearing one she was a baby herself. She knew her skirt would not be long enough to cover the diaper, growing red at the thought of Ash or anyone else seeing her like this. As the light faded, she gripped the bottom of her skirt, trying to pull it down enough to cover her diaper. However, she was surprised to notice that Ash was nowhere to be found.

"Hey, Dawn, what's taking you so long?" A familiar voice stated from five or so yards away.

Dawn was surprised to see May pop up from a bush, partially shielding her eyes.

"Aren't you finished getting dressed yet? We need to go." May stated lowering her hand from her face.

"May? But...where's Ash?" Dawn stated, temporarily forgetting her new undergarments.

"Ash? We've been traveling together alone for two weeks, Dawn? Are you feeling okay?" May questioned, looking confused.

"Oh, uh yeah...just tired, I guess..." Dawn stated, trying to make sense of the situation.

"Okay then, let's get goin-...Dawn...are you wearing what I think you're wearing...?" May asked cautiously, not believing what she was seeing poking out from Dawn's skirt.

"I-I..." Dawn stuttered, face turning redder and redder, "It..uh, it's..."

Dawn looked at the stone she was holding, noticing that it had dulled into a standard stone, no longer glowing. She slipped it into hr backpack while she tried to think of an excuse, hoping it would be able to help her return, later.

"I-I"...Dawn continued, weakly, no excuse coming to mind.

Making matters worse, Dawn felt herself involuntarily releasing her bladder, audibly splashing against the plastic of the diaper. She was nervous enough for it to happen involuntarily anyway, but she was sure that it was also the cause of the mysterious stone.

"Dawn...you just..." May stated, not knowing how else to react.

Dawn had no idea what to do. She could either try explaining the truth, but most likely just be dismissed as crazy and institutionalized, or she could lie and pretend that she had recently realized a physical need to wear them, even if that was embarrassing.

"Well, May, you see..." Dawn started...

1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.content:
Dawn began to cry. "Oh, May, I was horrible!" she wailed. "I'm slowly losing control of myself!"

May looked at Dawn in shock. "What!?!"

"I... It's some kind of new virus that's been effecting Pokemon." said Dawn, pulling out her Pokedex. "Here is what happened to a friend of mine." she paused, loading up a picture. "You remember Scott, right?"

"Yeah." said May. "I remember him." then she saw the image. "Oh my god! The virus did 'that' to him!?!"

http://images2.fanpop.com/images/photos/...

Dawn nodded, crying, as it was the truth and prayed that the stone would not get any ideas. "The first stage of the virus causes the victim to loose control of all of his or her bowels." she said. "Dr. Rowen told me that it was to cleans the body of everything we ate and drank." she paused. "The more I eat, the more pee and poop."

"What happens when your system is completely cleaned out?" asked May, becoming concerned.

Dawn chocked down a sob. "I start changing!" she replied. "May, I'm scared!"

May placed a sisterly arm around Dawn. "We'll figure something out." she said. then an idea came to mind. "Brock!"

"What about Brock?" asked Dawn.

"He's almost a genius when it comes to stuff like this!" she said, pulling Dawn along. "It's a good thing he's in town today to catch up with Ash!"

"When May finds out the truth, she's going to 'kill' me." thought Dawn, crying. "I should have just told her the truth about the stone. What am I going to do?"

Just then, the stone began to glow and Dawn wet her diaper. Feeling the warmth of her fluids, she inwardly panicked. "Oh, crap!" she thought. "The stone has given me the virus!"

"Don't worry, Dawn!" said May, hearing her cry. "with Brock and Ash working together, we'll have an antidote for you in no time and you will be back to normal."

"I hope so." replied Dawn, fearful.

Minutes later, the two find Brock and Ash at a small restaurant where May quickly explained what was happening to Dawn. what happens next?

1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.content:
A loud foghorn pulled Ash into reality “What happened to me?” Ash asked beginning to scream when she saw her new small arm.

Dawn came rushing into the room with Piplup and Pikachu on her shoulders “oh good you’re awake” she said.

“Awake, what happened? Why are you so big? Why’s Pikachu on your shoulder? Where are we?” Ash stammered like a mad person.

“Ash, Ash, calm down” Dawn begged kneeling down to Ash’s level and taking her hand. “Now you’re a little behind sweetie, after Professor Rowan’s machine grew you to normal size with the first bad side affect you passed out” she began.

“First bad side effect?” asked Ash nervously.

“Well yeah there was a second effect” said Dawn pointing to a mirror, Ash screamed when she saw a five year old girl where her reflection should be. “I know, I know” said Dawn hugging Ash and patting the child on the back. “Anyway after you turned into a little girl you passed out, professor Rowan said that your body was temporarily shut off so it could make more inner changes” said Dawn. “Anyway after you passed out I took you to my house for a while, put your Pokémon in storage…” Dawn began.

“Wait you did what?” demanded Ash looking around for her training belt only to find it gone.

“Ash you’re five years old now, the law says you have to be at least ten to be a Pokémon trainer, little kids can borrow Pokémon from their parents but other than that a five year old can’t have Pokémon” said Dawn.

“Then why’s Pikachu still here?” asked Ash.

“Legally Pikachu’s under my name I kept him around to help you cope” said Dawn.

“So where are we now?” asked Ash.

“On a boat to Kanto” answered Dawn “You were out for almost two days and the day of our boat came around and I decided to board and let you sleep” she added.

“Where’s the stone?” asked Ash.

“Back at professor Rowan’s lab he wants to examine it” said Dawn.

“And fix me?” asked Ash.

“Hopefully” said Dawn walking toward the closet “in the mean time we should get you ready for tonight there’s a big buffet to welcome all the passengers” she said sliding the closet open. It was at that moment that Ash realized she was only wearing a pair of little girls’ panties which judging from their faded yellow color and damaged elastics were once Dawn’s. “I found the cutest little outfit for you at the gift shop” said Dawn pulling out a little girls sailor dress making Ash almost freeze in fear “but first someone needs a bath” said Dawn taking Ash’s hands and dragging the child into the bathroom.

1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.content:
"Ok," Ash said, hurrying up his pace.

The two hurried towards Dawn house, her shrinking speeding up as they ran. After awhile, Ash had to carry Dawn, because she was too short to keep up, especially with her clothes collapsing around her. By the time they had reached her house, she was only up to Ash's knees, but her shrinking had completely stopped.

"I don't feel that feeling of my body collapsing anymore" Dawn stated, her head popping out of her shirt's collar, "I guess I won't be getting any smaller than this."

The two entered her house, her mother sitting in the living room reading a book.

"Oh, Ash, it's good to see you." She stated, looking up from her book, "Uh, but where's Dawn? And what are those clothes that you're holding?"

At that moment, Dawn lost her footing on Ash's arm, and slipped through her massive skirt, her underwear wrapped around her body.

"D-Dawn!? Is that you? What happened?" Her mother questioned, looking at the small stature of her daughter.

"I dunno, I just started shrinking and it finally stopped at this height." Dawn stated, looking embarrassed, "I'm going to need new clothes..."

"Oh, well, let's get you dressed first before we worry about anything else." She replied, "Ash, why don't you go in the kitchen and make some lunch, dear, I'm sure this is awkward for both of you. Dawn, go into your room and wait there, I'll go to the attic and get some old clothes and meet you there."

Dawn grabbed the rest of her clothes from Ash, and tried to wrap them around herself as well, merely creating an odd set of robes that were unstable and likely to fall off.

"Umm, here, this should be easier..." Dawn's mother said, scooping her daughter off the ground and cradling her like a child, the clothes wrapping around her resembling something of a blanket.

She walked up the stairs and carefully placed her daughter on the floor in her room, Dawn staring at all her now large possessions.

"Just wait here and I'll be right back", She stated, closing the door behind her.

Dawn continued looking around, allowing the clothes to fall off her body now that she was alone. She walked over to her old teddy bear, marveling at its size compared to her. Dawn laid against its large, plush body, feeling comfortable for the first time since she started diminishing. Dawn's mother walked into the room at that time, smiling at the scene as she closed the door behind her. Dawn looked up, blushing a bit, both at her childish action, and at her own nudity. Dawn's mother was carrying a bundle of clothing, though Dawn couldn't make out what they looked like.

"Ok, come on" Dawn's mother stated, lifting Dawn up, "Hmm, here should be good", She placed her down on the desk.

She placed the bundle on the chair below the desk, out of Dawn's eyesight. It seemed like more than was needed, based on the size, but Dawn was not sure if that was just a trick her mind was playing on her. Dawn's mother said nothing as she carefully laid Dawn down, confusing her daughter.

"Uhh, Mom-" Dawn said, getting cutoff.

"It'll be quicker if you don't talk, dear." Her mother said, clearly trying to avoid conversation.

She reached down towards the clothing bundle, and grabbed something, lifting it above the table. It was a plastic container of something, but Dawn could not tell what it was. Suddenly, her mother sprinkled the powdery contents of the container onto Dawn's privates, befuddling the teen. Her mother reached towards the bundle again, grabbing an object and causing a crinkling sound as it moved. Dawn looked confused at first, but her face turned bright red as the object came into her vision.

"I-is that...?" Dawn muttered, realization of what the powder was sinking in.

"It's just lucky I didn't throw out the last pack when I started potty training you," Her mother stated, showing off the little Castform design on the front.

"Mom! I just shrunk down to the size of a small child, I didn't get any younger!" Dawn shouted, sitting up and blushing.

"I knew you'd act this way..." Her mother sighed, "Listen, dear, until we get this fixed, you ARE the size of a small child. These are the only types of clothes that are going to fit you, unless you want to walk around, dragging a pair of underwear with you."

"Well, still...I..." Dawn muttered, trying to think up a counter-argument.

"Besides", Her mother continued, "At this size, you won't be able to use the toilet, and I won't risk you falling in and drowning"

Dawn's face grew pale as her mother spoke.

"You...want me to USE that...thing, too!?" Dawn questioned, pointing to the diaper.

"Until we get you fixed, dear." Her mother replied, "It's the only safe alternative."

Dawn wanted to fight and wanted to scream, but merely laid back down, preparing herself for what was to come. Her mother took that as a signal to continue, even though her daughter was reluctant. She slid the diaper under Dawn, and taped up the sides. Dawn was amazed at how thick it was, her legs unable to come together due to the girth. Her mother than slid a red T-shirt with a Psyduck on it over her head and into place.

"The little Castforms turn to their Water form when you're wet." Her mother teased, eliciting nothing a strong glare in response.

"C'mon, I've had Ash getting your lunch ready while I got you dressed, so let's go down and get you some food" Her mother stated, lifting Dawn up.

"H-hey, what about pants!?" Dawn shouted, "I can't go downstairs like this!"

"Sorry, dear, this was all I could find" Her mother stated, "Ash would have to find out sooner or later, so it might as well be now."

Dawn sighed as her mother carried her downstairs, and past the living room. As they entered the kitchen, Dawn saw a confused looking Ash, the table off to the side and out of Dawn's sight.

"Umm, I set it up" Ash stated, seeing Dawn's mother, "Not that-Dawn, what are you wearing..." Ash burst out laughing seeing Dawn wearing the baby t-shirt and diaper.

"Shut up, you-" Dawn shouted, her mother placing a hand over her mouth to stop the yelling.

"It is her only choice until we fix this," Her mother said, "Please be considerate of her...condition."

"Fine, fine, sorry..." Ash mumbled, "Though I understand why you wanted me to set that up now" Ash glanced over at the table.

Dawn turned at looked at the table, sighing at what she saw.

1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.content:
Up next to the table, between two chairs, was her old high chair, a bowl of oatmeal sitting on the tray next to a baby bottle of milk.

"Of course..." Dawn muttered, sighing as she was placed in the high chair, glaring as the seatbelt-esque strap was buckled around her waist, diaper crinkling all the while.

Her mother sat at the chair next to her, and spooned some of the oatmeal out of the bowl, holding it up to her diminished daughter's mouth.

"Mom, I can feed myself!" The teen shouted, turning her head away from the spoon.

"These utensils are too big for your size," Her mother stated simply, "And you won't be able to lift a full glass with your stature. Just be lucky I didn't make you wear a bib."

Dawn sighed and opened her mouth, accepting the oatmeal, since it was her favorite flavor.

"This is going to be very annoying..." Dawn thought to herself, feeling her diaper rustle with every slight motion she made.

After her oatmeal was finished, her mother handed the bottle to her, telling her to drink up. Dawn sighed once more and began suckling on the bottle, feeling the cold milk spurt into her mouth. After she had finished, her mother lifted her out of the highchair.

"Hmm, nope, not Water-form Castforms yet." Her mother teased, patting Dawn on her padded behind.

"Mom!" Dawn whined, blushing, "When we, uh...get to that, I won't just let it happen without saying anything..."

"I'm just teasing you" Her mother smiled, "you can go watch TV now."

Dawn climbed onto the couch and turned on the TV, watching her favorite show. After about an hour, Dawn blushed as she realized that she had to relieve herself. Her bladder kept pushing her to go, but she blushed, not knowing what she should do.
