The transformation, like most others were painless. Unfortunately, they were all different so Ash had no idea what to expect. Fortunately, the gym leader, Maylene was about his size so he did not shrink more than an inch or two.

"I wonder how long I'm going to be stuck in this transformation." thought Ash, feeling a tingle in his feet. "Hopefully not long, I want to get back to catching Pokemon soon."

Ash paused as he watched his shoes and socks disintegrate, leaving a pair of feminine looking bare feet. Then, slowly, the changes moved up his legs. He could feel them becoming smooth and shapely before letting out a gasp as his manhood suddenly got pulled into his body before it quickly morphed into woman hood. As this was happening, Ash saw that his blue jeans had changed into a pair of white girl's pants and that his drawers had morphed into a silk pair of panties, making him blush brightly.

"I'll never get used to this." he muttered.

He moaned as he felt a tinge of pain from his ovaries and female reproductive organs forming into place within him, now her, just as her stomach and back curved inward. Immediately after, Ash felt a weight growing onto her chest. She knew what it was as a bra appeared under a shirt that was not hers and her hat vanished.

"I guess that's it." she said, softly. "The changes are done, I'm now gym leader Maylene... for now."

But the stone was not done with Ash and Dawn yet as they both vanished from where they were and found themselves in a room where gym leader Maylene, now Ash, was lying down on a couch, looking miserable. Maylene and Dawn rushed over to him and he explained.

"Team Rocket has challenged this gym to a battle but they somehow got me sick just before the match." he said, teary eyed. "If I can not face their champion soon, I will be declared the loser and Team Rocket will get all of my Pokemon!"

"So that's why the stone changed me into Maylene." thought Ash. then, she said. "I'm Maylene, for the moment. I'll go face them in battle in your place."

"I'll help." said Dawn, now figuring out how the stone works. "I will be your most powerful Pokemon!"

The stone began to glow, hearing her wish and it was so granted.

Which Pokemon did Dawn change into?

In the same instant Ash touched the stone, he thought of the formal Geisha outfit he saw at the store and wondered how it would look on Dawn. Unfortunately, the stone did not interpret complete thoughts, it only picked up the Geisha outfit from his mind and the change began.

"Oh, great!" said Ash, hearing his pants rip. "The stone must have picked up my thought!"

"What thought was that, Ash?" asked Dawn.

Ash moaned. "I thought about the formal Geisha outfit you and I were looking at the other day." he said. "Now, thanks to the stone, I'm going to be wearing it!"

Ash's pants continued to rip up the seams of the legs, up to his crotch then flew outward, revealing that Ash's briefs were changing into a pink pair of panties. Dawn covered her mouth, to silence her laughter as the pant legs then fused back together, forming a long skirt before changing texture from cotton to silk.

"Why does this keep happening to me?" asked Ash.

"Because you're holding the stone." replied Dawn, guessing. "Be glad that your not changing gender this time."

Ash looked down at his shirt and found that it too had changed texture from cotton to silk and had merged with his long 'skirt' to form the Geisha outfit as more fabric was added from Ash's spare clothes, in his bag to complete the look with a long red sash that was once his red scarf.

"It looks like the change is done." said Ash, seeing his sneakers become sandals to match his new look. "What should he do now?"
1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.title: Formal

1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.content:
"Give me that!" scolded Dawn, taking the stone from him. "You need to be careful what you think and say when holding the stone, otherwise, you could end up in a very embarrassing situation, or worse!"

Just then, the stone began to glow and Dawn screamed. "Oh, crap!" she wailed. "I was thinking about changing your outfit back to your normal clothing!"

Ash laughed. "You have to be more careful!!" he teased.

Dawn moaned as her skirt grew down to her ankles then fused together and changed shape to form a pair of jeans. As the jeans changed from pink to blue, her shirt changed as well. Then, her bra vanished and her panties changed in size and texture, becoming a pair of boys' underwear.

"This is a nightmare!" she cried, seeing her jacket becoming more manly and her socks and shoes changing to match her new out fit. "What are we going to do!?!"

Ash shrugged. "Why don't we just switch clothes." he suggested. "It's not like we switched genders or anything."

"That's a good idea, Ash." said Dawn, smiling but first..."

She took some string from her bag and tied it around the changing stone, tuning it into a crude necklace before putting it on, around her neck. "This thing has caused enough trouble."

Just then, the stone began to glow again!

If he would pay more attention to himself however he would notice how his shorts were extending down to his ankles and becoming baggier and more loose fitting. Suddenly it felt like Ash was flying through the air at a very fast pace when suddenly it came to a screeching halt. He shook his head to clear the cobwebs and he looked around to see that he was in what appeared to be a traditional Japanese village.

However that wasn't what shocked him the most as when he looked down he saw he was now wearing a baggy pink kimono and a pair of high heeled sandals. "Just what is going on here?" he asks himself.

Suddenly someone calls out for him by name, who is it?

Ash turns around as he hears his name being called and sees an adult male making his way over towards him. "Who are you and how do you know me?" Ash asks.

The man let's out a chuckle as he slips an arm around Ash's waist. "How could you forget your own husband Akira?" he asks with a wide grin.

What Akira just said causes Ash to panic. "Husband? There must be some mistake I'm a teenage boy." he replies.

Akira just laughs some more. "That's very funny Ash, we've been married for 12 years, you think I'd forget that. Come on this is a party let's go have some fun." he says as he starts to lead Ash away.

Akira looks disappointed but then brightens up. "That's ok Ash, but don't think I won't be back to try again." he says with a grin and heads off.

Once Akira is out of sight, Ash looks over and notices that his old trainer clothes have appeared on the ground. "Alright now I can get out of this kimono and back into my old clothes and get out of here." he says to himself.

However before he can get out of the kimono, Dawn appears next to him dressed as a male yukuta. Her eyes then lock on Ash. "Ash what's going on here? Why are you dressed like that?" she asks.

Before he can respond someone approaches.

Before introductions could be made, Ash's trainer outfit suddenly disappeared and re-appeared on Megumi. Ash was no doubt horrified at what happened but even more shocked at what happened next. "I'd like you to meet my nephew Ash, he's going to be a Pokemon trainer." he says.

The original Ash and Dawn just stare wide-eyed at what just happened as they fail to notice changes happening to them. Dawn's hair starts to become shorter while Ash's begins to get longer down to his chin level where it starts to shine a bit.

She asked an employee for the way to the changing room and set off. About an hour thirty minutes later, she popped out from the curtains.

With the light from the stone dissipated, both Dawn and Ash quickly checked themselves over to see if anything was wrong with them. They figured nothing would be, but in the wondrous and sometimes zany world they lived in, they still felt the urge to check.

Assured that nothing was wrong with them, the two turned their attention to the other.

"Are you okay?" both of them asked in unison. "I'm fine," answered the two again in unison.

"What do you think that was Ash?" asked Dawn, still concerned about what the flash may have been.

"It looked like an evolutionary stone flash. Or it was very similar at the least," answered Ash as he looked over the stone that now sat in his hands. "We should go ask someone in the next town about it. Maybe someone around here has an idea."

"That's a good idea Ash," answered Dawn as she spun in the direction of the next town and started on the way. After placing the stone in his bag, Ash followed after her.

A little while later the two decided to take a short break. Walking off the main road a little, they were able to find a small clear in where they could set up camp. A few minutes later, the two companions had set up a small camp and had set about making a bit of lunch.

However, as Ash set about looking over a pot of stew, Dawn was beginning to feel strange. She felt as if something was scratching at the back of her mind, telling her to do something. It was calling her, begging her, but she could not hear it. She also found her boots becoming uncomfortable and, oddly enough, her butt was actually itching. Her hands clinched themselves as they pawed one another. She wanted to distance herself from... from... something. She did not know what, but she had to do it quickly.

"Ash... I'ma... nya~. I'm gonna take care of something... Be right back," said Dawn as she started to walk towards the edge of the clearing.

"Okay, but be back soon. The stew will be ready soon," called Ash who was too fixated on the boiling pot to notice Dawn had already passed the treeline and was now in the forest.

What does Dawn do, fight or accept?

"What am I doing out here?" Dawn wonders as she steps deeper in the wood. Trying to shake off this... 'instinct,' she became nauseous. As she lurched over, hands on her knees and rear in the air, a small rip catches her ear, followed by an alien sensation from her spine and the cool air on her bum. After a few dry heaves that warrant no result, she stands back up to see the commotion, and nearly stumbles and falls at the sight. "I... Is that... a tail?! Nya?" Certainly enough, a grey tabby tail extending five feet from her rear was lifting up the rear of her skirt, showing off her bum to any forest critters (or ninja) that cared. Dawn, wholly embarrassed, tries to hold the seat of her skirt down, but her excited state is keeping her tail hiked. Just then, she felt a pulling on her ears. Taking her hands from skirt, she kneels down and opens her satchel, finding a mirror. With it, she watches as her now almost elven ears start to widen and move up her head, grey hairs slowly accruing on its surface. "What... is... going... ON!!" Dawn yells, the racket reverberating through the forest, and through her newly super sensitive ears. As the ears finish their migration, they knock her hat off her head. In trying to catch it, she instinctively snares the headband on the end of her tail.

The sound of Dawn's yelling catches Ash's attention, and he comes running. As Ash starts to close, Dawn's chest swells, reaching DD size, her top seemingly stretching and morphing to accommodate her new bustline. Dawn starts shaking her head again. "Nya, Feel so weird... It's like something keeps telling me to go somewhere and do something... But I don't want to..." Ash shows as another flash lights the area...

"NNOOOOO!!!!!!" Dawn screams. Suddenly, an ominous grey fog lifts from her, the desires filling her mind faded away into nothingness, leaving her mind unclouded. "What was that..." She uttered, taking her hat off her tail and trying to put it back on her head, but her new ears wouldn't have it. Finally, she tucked them under the hat, but it was uncomfortable, and her ears popped up sending her hat flying up. Dawn groaned, and busted out some scissors & thread, and with some deftness made some slits in her favorite hat for her cat ears.

Another draft up her skirt across her rear reminded her of her tail lifting her skirt up. Looking around to make sure there were no looky-loos, she removed the miniskirt and cut a hole in the rear and sewed the material taut to prevent unraveling. Dawn slipped it back on, sliding her tail through the new tail hole in the miniskirt.

"Well, that's better, but still, what happened to me?" Dawn pondered, wiggling her tail about, trying to adjust to the new limb. Suddenly, Ash bursts out of the bushes and into the area Dawn had transformed in. "Dawn, what's wrong?! I heard your scream... Hey, you got a tail? What's going on? Are you a ditto? If you are, I'm going to catch you!!" He grabs a pokeball as Dawn grabs her forehead and shakes her head.

"No, Ash, I'm not a Ditto. I don't know what happened, but suddenly I wanted to come out here, and then grew these ears and this tail. I'm still confused... Ash?" The grey fog from before sucks itself into Ash's orifices, and Dawn begins to worry.

"What is that pleasant smell, nya?" Ash asks Dawn. Dawn only stares back at him, realizing what just happened to her was about to happen again, but what she didn't know was there to be an extra act this time. Ash blanks out as an orange furred tail rips out of the seat of his jeans. As his ears started to change, Dawn noticed Ash's hips widen and his waist shrank. "Huh?" Dawn exclaimed, tail hiking up in curiosity. Dawn walked closer to the somewhat zombified Ash as his face began to feminize, lips becoming pouty, nose becoming button-like and petite, eyes growing larger and more expressive, eyelashes growing, and eyebrows thinning as cheekbones and other features became softer and narrower. Once the ears hit the top of his head, knocking his hat off, Dawn began to notice Ash's vest beginning to tent outward, much like how her shirt and vest did when she changed. "Holy Houou!! It's turning Ash into a girl!!"

As Ash's new breasts finished their growth at an astounding E-cup size (espicially for a 12-year old), his her clothes started shifting. "What now?! Ash... ASH!! Wake up!!" Dawn was getting very concerned. This was different. Apparently, since whatever had changed had to make Ash a girl, it must be adjusting Ash's clothes, Dawn concluded. She could only sit back and watch as Ash's jeans separate at the knees as his vest and shirt merge, the sleeves of the shirt shrinking away. His new shirt shrank further, becoming a taut tank top with the same coloration as the vest. The upper portion of the jeans shriveled up, the legs fusing together as the fabric changed from denim to polyester, and began pleating up, forming a blue tartan pleated miniskirt, complete with a tail hole in the rear. The lower half of the former jeans slid down to her knees and turned white. Creases form in it as it turns into wool, as ornate cherry trees and sakura blossoms begin decorating the sock-like leg warmers. Worried the strange instinct she felt before would overtake Ash, Dawn, grits her teeth, lowers her stance, draws back, and screams, "I SAID 'COCK-A-DOODLE-DOO!!' NOW LET ME SEE THOSE EYES OPEN!!" The strange grey fog leaves Ash, changing color to pink and flittering out of sight above them, as though to watch them. "Why did you hit me, Dawn?" Ash yelled, suddenly covering his mouth after hearing the mezzo-soprano voice coming from her mouth. Dawn pulls out a mirror and says, "I figure it'll be quicker if I show you than try to tell you."

Dawn hands Ash the mirror, and the shock of what she sees makes her lightheaded. A cute, clearly female face was staring back at him, with two large orange cat ears on her head. Interestingly though, the girl's hair was the same as his own. Clearly in shock, Dawn confirms her suspicions. "Whatever changed me... changed you too, and made you a girl at the same time. You also tranced out while it happened. If I hadn't of decked you, you would of felt a strange urge to go somewhere. Did you feel an urge to go somewhere?" Ash, still in shock, looking over her new body and wardrobe, simply nods. "What's going on...?" Ash says, scared, almost in tears. Dawn holds her, saying, "I don't know. Best thing I can think of is head home to Twinleaf Town and ask Professor Rowan for help."

1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.content:
The luminous light from the stone gradually fades away as it envelopes both Ash and Dawn within it's rays. Exhausted, the stone dropped down from Ash's and Dawn's hand.
Both trainers looked at each other in confusion and then back at the bizarre yet peculiar stone.

"What was that all about?" questioned Ash.
"That was the weirdest light show ever." replied Dawn, shrugging her shoulders before heading back onto the main road. "C'mon Ash, let's head on over to Sandgem Town before it gets dark."

Eying the stone one last time, Ash simply turned away and caught up to Dawn as they continued their journey towards town. The horizon was drunken with shades of fiery red, orange and golden yellow as the sun began to hide beneath the trees, signalling the end of the day. The forest had grown silent and was gradually getting darker. This was as far as both trainers were going to get.

"Let's make camp here." Dawn exclaimed, placing her bag down.

Agreeing with her plan, Ash began building the tent. While he unraveling the plastic sheet, he noticed something "odd" with Dawn. He stopped constructing the pylons of the tent and approached her.

"Dawn?"
Lighting the campfire, Dawn stood up and answered. "Yes, Ash?"
"Umm... is it me or did you grow a bit taller?"

Standing up tall, Ash began measuring his height against Dawn. Dawn, who was normally just a few centimeters off Ash's height, was now at least 5-7 inches (15 - 17 centimeters) taller than him. Not only was Dawn's height a bit odd but her build was become a bit more curvaceous.

"Me, a bit taller? Yeah, I'm taller." Dawn replied with a light chuckle as Ash constantly checked his height and shoulder height against Dawn's. "Well, I am a growing child after all. Maybe it's just a growth spurt."

Yeah, but growth spurts like that don't happen instantaneously! Ash said to himself mentally before dismissing the idea altogether. With the tent finally built, sleeping bags rolled out and a warm campfire burning in the middle of them, both trainers basked within it's warmth next to each other. Though Dawn was blissfully comfortable sitting next to him, Ash couldn't help but ponder over the weird stone and Dawn's sudden changes. Recalling the events in his mind as he dazed into the campfire, he suddenly felt a rough nudge push against his side.

Thud!

"Hey Ash, you okay?"

Snapping out of his trance, Ash picked himself off the ground and looked over towards a worried Dawn who was now becoming more voluptuous than the last time. In addition to her shape-shifting build, Dawn's clothes were awfully becoming overstretched. He could see multiple tear marks near the side of her black n' pink dress along with some cleavage bulging at the top and pink panties being revealed below her incredibly tight, short skirt.

Since when did she become more... womanly? Ash commented to himself, staring from Dawn's new inflated, firm breasts up to her eyes which were slowly turning into a shade of red.

"World to Ash? Hello Ash? Can you hear me?"
"Huh? What?" Ash responded, shaking his head.
"Geez, what's wrong with you." Dawn exclaimed. "I kept calling out to you but it looked like you were stoned there!"

Stretching out her hand to help him up, a loud ripping noise ruptured throughout the campsite. Ash's face was completely stunned. Dawn's face was tomato red as she peered at her clothes which almost in twain thanks to the massive rips along the side of her dress. Immediately, she slapped Ash away frantically as she began to recover her falling pieces of her once dress.

"Ash! Don't look at me!" yelled Dawn, trying to shoo him away. "Damn, I gotta have to buy more clothes..."

What in Acreus' name is going on? Ash wondered, seeing Dawn's awkwardly new body changes.
1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.title: Physical changes...

1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.content:
Shooed off into the tent, Ash waited patiently for Dawn's panicking to subsided. From time to time, he would peep from the entrance flaps of the tent to see Dawn's blossoming "beauty" only to be yelled at harshly by her or get hit straight in the face by one of her solid punches. One thing he did catch from one of his peeping moments was Dawn's hair. Her long dark blue that had yellow clips holding parts of her hair was shifting. The shade of her hair was growing darker and darker, no longer resembling any color of blue but instead a monotonous black.

The yellow clips hoisting up sections of her long hair, both instantaneously snapped as her hair began to shift and extend itself. Her hair, growing wildly underneath her white beanie, began moving downwards passing her shoulder and waist till it slowed down it's progress, ending itself near the tip of her curvaceous, bare cheeks of her butt. But Dawn was still unaware of the changes that were occurring as she scrambled to acquire whatever pieces of fabrics that was trying to cover up her exposure.

Maybe I should check one more time. Ash concocted in his mind, creeping ever so closely to the flaps of the tent. His fantasies that were non-existent when he was around the regular Dawn were now overflowing his mind, intoxicating and poisoning his mind with perverted images of his dear friend. Extending his pinkie towards the crack of the tent, he gulped and began bending towards the exit-

"Ash Ketchum, you pervert! I know you're about to peep at me again!!"

Busted! Ash frantically scrambled to the backside of the tent. Sweating profusely, he tried to calm himself down and answered back. "No- No, I'm not!"

"I know you're lying right there!" scolded Dawn. "Your dirty mind gives it away!"

Hang on! How can she read my mind? Ash pondered to himself. No, I'm overthinking it. She just got lucky there.

"Hey Dawn, weird question but what am I thinking now?" asked Ash as he recomposed himself.
"How can I read your mind and how you're testing out your assumption to see if it's right, right?" Dawn answered.
Second time lucky? That can't right!
"And now your thinking how I got that right?" Dawn further answered.
Holy mother of- !!

Dawn poked her head inside the tent, spooking Ash as he stumbled backwards and landed on the ground. Her haunting red eyes was piercing straight into his soul as he trembled in fear. Somehow, this feeling of fear, he felt as if he had known it from somewhere. But from where?

"Ash, I'm gonna need your jacket." ordered Dawn, eying his pale face.

Silently nodding his head, he complied to her request. He took off his jacket and nervously passed it towards Dawn.

"Thanks Ash." thanked Dawn. " Umm- are you feeling okay. It's almost as if you seen a ghost-"
I'm fine!" interjected Ash. "I'm totally fine! Fine as fine can be!"

Raising an eyebrow, Dawn rolled her piercing red eyes and left him alone inside the tent. Huddling towards the corner of the tent, Ash began rocking back and forth in an attempt to shake off the restlessness of gazing at her eerie red eyes.

That's definitely not a growth spurt right there! That's something else!
1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.title: The mystery continues...

choices: Give into temptation! Go Ash! Sneak into that tent!
Give her some privacy Ash! Control yourself! You're sleeping outside!

"Maybe it's just Dawn's new contact lens. Yeah, that's right! Dawn's new red contact lens!" Ash mumbled to himself crazily, ridding the mental of her soul-piercing eyes.

Fifteen minutes have gone by since Dawn last visited Ash inside the tent. Ash, frightened by what's happening to his friend, tried to calm himself down and work up any remaining form of courage that was lingering within him. It was just an appearance change right? Nothing bad would happen to him, right? Underneath all those changes, she's just Dawn! Ash smiled to himself as nodded to all those statement his mind made up. Standing up from his pitiful huddled up self, Ash approached towards the exit of the tent where he opened the flaps wide open and ventured forth towards the-

"Oh, about time you came out of that tent!"

Ash's face exploded a bright red shade. Sitting in front of the campfire was Dawn, in a body of at least a young semi-naked 20 something-year-old female. Her top was exposing her massive C maybe borderline D-cup breasts along with some revealing cleavage from above and below her bosoms. Heck, even his jacket was not helping with covering up her bare, naked top. Her hourglass figure was so curvaceous, it almost perfect! At bottom, no longer was her cute pink panties there but instead a white frilled laced, black seductive lingerie, wrapped comfortably around the waist and in between. Her long, slender yet graceful legs. It was literally a sight for sore eyes!

"I-I-I, where, wah you..." Ash stammered with a dumbfound personality as his eyes were locked on the beauty that was sitting in front of him.

"Oh sorry, I had to borrow your jacket." apologized Dawn, alluring the withdrawn yet heavily blushing Ash with her red eyes. "My bra broke and none of my dresses could fit me."

"Uh- It-it-it's fine. Fine. Fine."
"I was wondering if you got a spare pair of jeans that I could borrow. It feels kinda cold out here."
"Jeans- yes, yes. I got some. There- uh, there should be..."
"Ash, you okay?"

During his journey, Ash never thought about girls. He was a one-track kind of guy, always setting his eyes for being a Pokemon Master. Not one single thought about girls tainted his pure mind, that is until his mind got derailed by tonight. Scurrying towards his backpack, Ash quickly grabbed any pair of jeans he could find in his bag and quickly lunged them towards Dawn.

Gotta think of something else. Pure thoughts, anything!! Ash thought to himself while attempting to avert gazing upon Dawn's incredible, seductive, voluptuous, amazing-

Well there goes his one-track mind there. And the whole train carriage with it.

Slipping into his pair short, tight skinny jeans, Dawn invited Ash over to her. No longer ruled by any scene of conscience, Ash walked on over to where Dawn was and mindlessly sat down close to her. Dawn, smiling joyful, rested her head against his shoulder and hugged his arm tightly. Inside Ash's mind right now, he could hear his best friend Brock crying out to him to get closer to her.

"Set the romantic mood! Cuddle her!" Brock cried out to him, mentally giving him a thumbs up image.

Resisting, Ash shook his head continued to stare into the campfire, nodding his head to every word Dawn spoke. His conscience was not out of this battle for control.

"Hey Ash, I'm kinda getting sleepy." Dawn whispered into his ear. "I'm gonna go sleep in the tent."

With that, Dawn gently let go of Ash's arm and gracefully walk off towards the tent, taking off her white beanie as it revealed more of her lavishing, flowing black hair. Ash could only just stare blankly at her ravishing, lustful new appearance as she disappeared into the tent. The real struggle for his mind now commenced as both angel and devil mentally appeared inside his head.

"Go get her! Confess to her, man!" Brock argued, mentally nudging his shoulder.
"Don't do it bro! You can control yourself!" His conscience counterattacked.

"Oh Ho-oh, what should I do? I can't decide for myself!" Ash cried to himself due to his indecisiveness.
1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.title: Oh, What a Night!

1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.content:
"Sorry conscience, but you're getting the boot" Ash said to himself as he circled around the campfire.

"No wait Ash that's-"
"You heard the man! Beat it!"

Mentally appearing in front of Ash, Brock gave one heck of boot to his conscience, who was sent blasting off (again)! Devilishly, Brock snickered and whispered into Ash's ear giving him suggestions on what to do in front of Dawn. Listening to ever wise advice Brock gave, Ash nodded while revealing a sly smirk before turning towards the tent. Towards his prey. Giving into his 'instinct', he approached the entrance of the tent and began concocting his plan. Snickering underneath his breath, he reached towards the curtain flap of the tent and viciously raised it wide open-

"So you were thinking about doing perverted things to me!!"

Ash's expression instantly dropped. No longer wild and acting on instinct. His face became terrified. Terrified to see Dawn who was standing in front of him, semi-naked and arms folded with a severely ticked off expression on her face. Snapping back into his conscience, he sheepishly laughed and bowed his head multiple times as a sign of forgiveness. But his forgiveness was down-right rejected as he saw Dawn's face becoming even more angry.

"Heh, heh, um... I'm sorry." Ash answered truthfully yet embarrassingly. "I think I'm gonna go this way now..."

Her red eyes flared up, bursting into blue flames inside her irises. Her black, silky long hair started to levitated as more blue flames started to coat around her figure, dancing wildly and outrageously. Several tiny will-o-wisps started spinning around her body as Ash's clothes that she was wearing started to twist, turn and fuse together. The fabrics extended around her body as they quickly clothed every single part of her bare body. In an instant, his jacket and his trousers had now become what appears to be a red n' black tamers outfit.

White gloves. Blood red with yellow lines outfit. Oversize black line stretched across her stomach section. Dark stockings and crimson boots. Ash suddenly realized that he had ticked off the last person in this world that he would want to meet. Standing in front of him was the Mistress of Psychic, Gym Leader Sabrina!

Fear leaped at an insurmountable rate as he began to leg it out of the tent- only to realize that his body wasn't listening to him. Enveloped around his body was a neon glowing blue light, freezing any action that Ash attempted to commit.

"You like gazing at my beautiful appearance, yes?" coldly questioned Sabrina, no longer having any traces of Dawn's conscience. "You love it so much that you were thinking of doing perverted things to me, is that correct?"

Ash tried to talk but his jaw was jammed shut. Only a muffled cried could be heard but it could not interpreted. He tried to shake his head but every muscle in his body was frozen.

"I think I'm feeling a bit gracious tonight." Sabrina continued. Death staring at the helpless trainer with a sinister smile. "If you love my body so much..."

Ash was lifted up into the air. His eyes widened in horror as the Mistress of Psychic was about inflict his punishment. Her outstretched hands focused on Ash's stiff body.

"...perhaps you would one yourself as well?"

Ash screamed in declination but it was far too late. He could feel his bones crack and break under the pressure. His body's temperature flared up. His face was going red. His body structure was breaking and shifting constantly as they began to take a new form. Ash's body was obeying every single command as Sabrina waved her hands vigorously yet violently. He continued to scream in pain but only indescribable muffled sounds could emerge from his tightened jaw. Emerging from his chest was a large set of erected D-cup breasts. His teenage man torso was degenerated instant and reconstructed in a perfect hourglass figure. His face became smooth and feminine. He couldn't believe his eyes! Just as Sabrina was staring towards below his equator, he constantly pleaded to her to make it stop.

"What's that? You want me to get rid the very thing that defines your masculinity?" Sabrina announced in a tormenting tone.

No! Don't do that!?

"Well then, I will gladly dispose of it then!"

Her outreached, telekinesis hand was grasping his region. Ash could feel it as if she was actually touching it! With one swift crush of he hand. Ash winced in pain as his testicles were plucked off like grapes. Hearing her maniacal laugh, his testicles began to forcefully shrivel back inside his body, forming painful ovaries from within. His manhood started to shred itself like a banana, cruelly stripping itself one by one as it sunk back into his almost feminine body. His masculinity was now completely replaced with a narrow clitoris. His body couldn't take the painful punishment any longer. But the treatment was far from finished.

His thighs, shifted and inflated, giving him child-bearing legs to compliment his new womanhood. Lastly she grasped his throat from a distance with her hand. Ash could talk now! But the only things that were coming out of his luscious lips were screams. Sabrina crushed his throat as he shouted out every remaining manhood. His manly voice was reaching higher and higher until finally his new voice permanently kicked in place. Finishing off his punishment, Sabrina pulled down his hair, forcefully extending itself to the point where it was shoulder-length.

"Finally..." Ash said, panting and heaving with his new voice.

"Who said that we're done, dear Ashley?" Sabrina replied back in a mocking tone.

We're not done yet!?
1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.title: Punishment! Mistress of Psychic Sabrina Strikes!

1553322222222222222222222222222222122222.content:
The stone illuminated the vicinity, flashing it's lights around in a circular motion around both trainers. Bright, warm and somewhat comforting. Soon the whirlwind of glittery lights gradually dissipated back into the stone, returning the forest and the trainers back to normal. The stone which was resting in the palm of both Ash and Dawn soon plummeted straight down onto the grassy patch in exhaustion.

"That light show was amazing!" Dawn cried out in joy. "Let's activate it again!"
"Go ahead, try it out!" Ash cheered her on.

Enthusiastic, Dawn picked up the stone again and began spasmodically shaking the stone in an attempt to start up another breath-taking experience. Ash, who was near Dawn, was roaring out with laughter as Dawn crazily danced up and down with the stone in her right hand. The both of them were laughing and having such a blast that they didn't notice what had occurred. The thin black bracelet with two silver beads that was resting on Dawn's right wrist had widen itself. The beads were no longer existent as it melded back into the bracelet. The soft black material that wrapped around her wrist began to harden, becoming a metal bangle. That metal bangle started to growing thicker and thicker to the point where it looked like a mini weight of a dumbbell.

Dawn, who was bouncing up and down vigorous energy, was soon completely deprived of energy as she dropped straight down onto the ground.

"Phew, so much for trying to get the stone to make that light show." Dawn sighed in exhaustion. "When did my wrist become so heavy?"

Dropping the stone out of Dawn's hand, Ash noticed the new accessory attached to her wrist. "Hey, that's new. Since when did you buy that?"

Dawn lifted her right arm and saw the bulky black bangle, which now has a neon green florescent light glowing around the middle. Puzzled but not bothered about it, she replied back to Ash casually. "I didn't buy this? But doesn't it look pretty, the glowing lights! Shame it doesn't come in pairs."

Ash looked over to her other wrist and was astonished what was happening. Protruding out of her wrist was another black n' green bulky bangle that look exactly identical to the other one. Pointing it out to Dawn, she turned over to other but was rather surprised then shocked.

"Yay! Matching pairs! That's so awesome!" Dawn blissfully cheered.
"But don't you think it's weird?" Ash exclaimed, not falling for the blissfully ignorant attitude that Dawn was conveying. "You got those bangles out of nowhere!"
"Maybe it's a stone that grant wishes!" proclaimed Dawn
"Oh come on that's not-"

RRRIIIIPPPPPP!!

A loud tear echoed throughout the forest. Dawn looked over towards her back and saw a massive horizontal tear in the middle of her black n' pink dress.

"Aww, my dress ripped and it's my favorite one! It's probably getting too small for me." cried Dawn.
"Hey, let's stop to make camp. I'm sure you can get stitched up by then." assured Ash as he began unpacking his camping equipment out from his bag.
"Yeah, you're right. I wish I had some new clothes with me..."

With the sun setting beyond the horizon and the forest growing darker, both Ash and Dawn diligently worked hard to build up camp. The warm toasty campfire ignited in the middle, tent unfolded and constructed and the sleeping bags rolled, it looked like it was gonna be a peaceful and serene night.

"Hey Ash, I'm gonna take a shower." Dawn said, grabbing a "shower in a can" from her bag. "Don't come this way, alright?"
"Like I would wanna peep at you nake-"

Before Ash could finish, he got hit in the head by Dawn's flying bag before face-planting himself straight into the dirt patch.

"You pervert!" Dawn exclaimed loudly before storming off behind the tent in a huff.
"What's her problem..."

Recovering from her unexpected attack, Ash lounged around near the warmth of the campfire. Not long after he felt relaxed, he heard Dawn muffled mumbling to herself before calling out for him. Ash turned his head towards the tent and saw Dawn in her-

"Hey Ash, look what I found!"

From the top, Dawn was wearing a striped pink camisole, revealing her curvy waist and cute bellybutton. Bottom part was a skinny pair of white trousers and a belt with a hexagon-shaped buckle. Her once pink boots were now replaced with pink loafers to compliment her sudden new attire. All up, Dawn was very ecstatic about her new clothes that she didn't a little strut around in them as if she was posing for the walkway.

"Isn't so adorable! I love it!" said Dawn gleeful, posing in front of Ash.
"Where did you get those clothes?" he asked, raising an eyebrow at her new wardrobe.
"I don't know. When I finished showering I turned towards my torn-up dress and there it was! These fabulous clothes appeared!" she responded in a carefree way.
"Yeah, they kinda look cute on you-"

Ash snapped out of his fixated gaze and stood up immediately. New clothes appearing out of nowhere, something was definitely going wrong here! "Hold up, aren't you a little bit curious as to how those clothes got there? Or how you suddenly got those new bangles without even noticing them in the first place?"

"I get it, you're just jealous cause you didn't get any new clothes!" retorted Dawn, glancing over at Ash in a jeering fashion.
"What? How does it relate to- Look, those clothes could be cursed or something-"
Dawn quickly shut down Ash.
"And you're telling me to take them off!? No chance pervert! Just for that, you're sleeping outside of the tent!"
"What! But-"
"But nothing! Good Night!"

With that, Dawn stormed off into the tent before zipping up the entrance leaving Ash with a "what-is-this-I-don't-even" face. Well, whatever problem Dawn is having, it's not my problem. Ash thought to himself as he huddle in front of the campfire. So much for a peaceful night but little did they know, this was just the start of their predicament.

As Ash picks up the stone, it begins to glow brightly, prompting him and Dawn to shield their eyes. When they open their eyes again, they are in a very different place. Differently animated, too.

Ash begins to look around, wondering where they are, how they got there, and how to get back. "What the heck?!" Exclaims Dawn. Ash looks over to see her wearing some kind of school uniform.
